# PropertyListSerialization.PropertyListFormat

**Enumeration**

These constants are used to specify a property list serialization format.

## Declaration

```swift
enum PropertyListFormat
```

## Constants

- **PropertyListSerialization.PropertyListFormat.openStep**: Specifies the ASCII property list format inherited from the OpenStep APIs.
- **PropertyListSerialization.PropertyListFormat.xml**: Specifies the XML property list format.
- **PropertyListSerialization.PropertyListFormat.binary**: Specifies the binary property list format.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **PropertyListSerialization.MutabilityOptions**: These constants specify mutability options in property lists.
- **PropertyListSerialization.ReadOptions**: The only read options supported are described in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/PropertyListSerialization/MutabilityOptions].

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
